subject: Baseball
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: Ryan Goins, whose fielding mistake in Game 2 led to a Kansas City rally, opened Toronto’s attack with a hit that drove in two runs, and the Blue Jays held on to narrow their A.L.C.S. deficit to 2-1.
snippet: Ryan Goins, whose fielding mistake in Game 2 led to a Kansas City rally, opened Toronto’s attack with a hit that drove in two runs, and the Blue Jays held on to narrow their A.L.C.S. deficit to 2-1.
